patthana8.4:1.1_0: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana8.4:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca
patthana8.4:1.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva
patthana8.4:1.1_3: naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.4:2.1_0: Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana8.4:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
patthana8.4:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
patthana8.4:2.1_3: ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.4:3.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.4:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
